meanings.sent1: The cat hid under the bed.
meanings.sent2: The treasure chest is under the sand.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a cozy spot under the tree.
meanings.sent4: The truth was hidden under layers of lies.
meanings.sent5: The submarine silently glided under the waves.

meanings.definition: In a lower position or level
meanings.sent1: She placed her book under the table.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit burrowed under the fence.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat rolled under the chair.
meanings.sent4: The sun disappeared under the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The temperature dropped under the freezing point.

meanings.sent1: The hidden treasure was under the rock.
meanings.sent2: The under layer of paint was still wet.
meanings.sent3: The underdog team surprised everyone with a win.
meanings.sent4: The undercurrent of emotions was palpable in the room.
meanings.sent5: The undercurrent of emotions was palpable in the room.

meanings.definition: Controlled or managed by someone or something
meanings.sent1: The under boss made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The undercurrent of the river dictated its flow.
meanings.sent3: The underdog team fought hard and won.
meanings.sent4: The undercurrent of the conversation shifted suddenly.
meanings.sent5: The undercurrent of the conversation shifted suddenly.

meanings.definition: Less than a specified amount or number
meanings.sent1: She had under ten dollars in her wallet.
meanings.sent2: The undercooked chicken was not safe to eat.
meanings.sent3: The underdog team won against all odds.
meanings.sent4: The undercurrent of tension was noticeable in the room.
meanings.sent5: The undercurrent of tension was noticeable in the room.
